definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, most notably associated with Michael Phelps, the American Olympic swimmer who holds the record for the most Olympic medals won by any athlete in history.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的姓氏，最著名的是与美国奥运游泳运动员迈克尔·菲尔普斯相关，他是历史上获得奥运奖牌总数最多的运动员。
definitions.example_en: Michael Phelps won 23 gold medals across five Olympic Games.
definitions.example_cn: 迈克尔·菲尔普斯在五届奥运会上赢得了23枚金牌。
